text: Robert Roest (born 30 October 1969) is a Dutch footballer who played as a defender for FC Utrecht, KSK Beveren, Fortuna Sittard and AGOVV Apeldoorn. ==External links== * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch footballers Category:FC Utrecht players Category:Fortuna Sittard players Category:AGOVV Apeldoorn players Category:People from Soest, Netherlands Category:Association football defenders
title: Robert Roest
